translation.en: She hadn't looked at the guide yet.
They switched from hindering his efforts to helping them.
He had been comforted.
The project was stationary.
Even though it was heavy and progress was slow, he kept pushing the crate towards the top of the hill.
translation.tam: Zima at Anzo. Zima and Bakor.

translation.en: What she learned was impossible to deny.
translation.tam: Chenza at court. The court of silence.

translation.en: He looked cold, so she offered him a blanket.
He snooped on their chat.
The governments had a cooperative agreement and mutually beneficial relationship.
She dismissed the information in the guide.
The child stopped crying and smiled.
That made him feel a great affection.
She knew the next action to be taken.
His duty was clear, regardless of the effort required.
Their adversary was before them.
The charm of their decoy was appealed to their enemy.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army at Lashmir. With fist open.

translation.en: The project was proceeding apace.
They offered greetings.
She suggested he seek shelter in her dwelling.
translation.tam: Chatha and Terubim, the fire warm.

translation.en: The adventurerers were unsuccessful, and doomed the entire village.
She backed their work.
She steered the submarine in the ocean.

translation.tam: Kira at court, the court filled.

translation.en: The situation looked concerning.
He tackled the enemy.
translation.tam: Uzani. His army. With fist closed.

translation.en: She made it visible.
After changing their methods, they started on a new trajectory.
The business beseeched their patrons.
She told him about her experiences.
She never realized what they were working to convey.
She was completely worn out.
They compelled him not to do it.
They decided to stop travelling on this path.
She checked if he needed to eat.
He didn't want to take the blanket.
She didn't anticipate observing it.
They were sore all over.
translation.tam: Zinda! His face black. His eyes red.

translation.en: The business intentionally refused to examine a possibility.
Coming to a compromise was likely the best course of action.
Nothing seemed to help the pain, regardless of how much he tried.
He'd learned a new skill.
He wanted to fall asleep quickly.
Their trek had seemed to last forever.
